original_text: And they shall cover the face of the earth, that one cannot be able to see the earth: and they shall eat the residue of that which is escaped, which remaineth unto you from the hail, and shall eat every tree which groweth for you out of the field:
korean_text: 메뚜기가 지면을 덮어서 사람이 땅을 볼 수 없을 것이라 메뚜기가 네게 남은 그것 곧 우박을 면하고 남은 것을 먹으며 너희를 위하여 들에서 자라나는 모든 나무를 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And they shall cover the face of the earth
that one cannot be able to see the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 땅을 볼 수 없게 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: and they shall eat the residue of that
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들이 그것의 남은 부분을 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: which remaineth unto you from the hail
which groweth for you out of the field
